mapper.select: select A.num, A.no, A.division, A.title, A.creatDate, A.hits, A.noticeId, A.noitcePwd, A.parNo, A.depth, A.seq, A.status, (select count(*) from cinemabox_answer where answer_noticeNo = A.no) as anwserCount, NVL(B.parNum ,0) as parNum, C.notice_title as parTitle, (select count(*) from cinemabox_file where file_noticeno = A.no) as getFileAllCnt, (select count(*) from cinemabox_notice where notice_title like '%${searchWord}%' ) as searchCnt from ( select notice_no no, notice_division division, notice_title title, notice_date creatDate, notice_hits hits, notice_id noticeId, notice_pwd noitcePwd, notice_par_no parNo, notice_depth depth, notice_seq_no seq, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (order by notice_par_no desc,notice_seq_no) numno, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (order by notice_par_no ,notice_seq_no ) num, notice_status status from cinemabox_notice where notice_title like '%${searchWord}%' order by parNo desc, seq )A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (order by notice_par_no ,notice_seq_no ) parNum, notice_no from cinemabox_notice where notice_no = notice_par_no ) B on (A.no = B.notice_no) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( select notice_title,notice_no from cinemabox_notice ) C on (A.parNo = C.notice_no) where numno between ${startPage} and ${endPage}
select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (order by notice_par_no ,notice_seq_no ) parName from cinemabox_notice where ${no}= ${parNo} order by notice_par_no desc
select ceil(count(*)/10) from cinemabox_notice where notice_title like '%${searchWord}%'
select count(*) from cinemabox_notice A, cinemabox_answer B where A.notice_no = B.answer_noticeNo and A.notice_no = #{no}
select count(*) from cinemabox_notice where notice_par_no = ${parNo} and notice_depth > ${depth} and notice_seq_no = ${seq} + 1
select notice_no no, notice_division division, notice_title title, notice_date creatDate, notice_hits hits from(select * from cinemabox_notice order by notice_date desc) where ROWNUM <= 4

select * from (select notice_no no, notice_content content, notice_title title, notice_date creatDate, notice_hits hits, LEAD(notice_no)over(order by notice_no desc) as preNo, LEAD(notice_title)over(order by notice_no desc) as preTitle, LAG(notice_no)over(order by notice_no desc) as nextNo, LAG(notice_title)over(order by notice_no desc) as nextTitle, notice_par_no as parNo, notice_seq_no as seq, notice_depth as depth from cinemabox_notice )A where A. no= #{no}
